products.manufacturer: Big Bear American Made Choppers, Inc.

summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 BIG BEAR CHOPPER, VENOM PROSTREET MOTORCYCLE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE PER NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 08V129000 ( STRUCTURE). THERE HAVE BEEN SEVERAL ATTEMPTS TO NOTIFY THE MANUFACTURER AND REQUEST ASSISTANCE REGARDING THE MANDATED RECALL DEFECT. THE CONTACT WAS DISPLEASED WITH THE MANUFACTURER NOT RESPONDING TO THE MESSAGES. THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER'S REPORT DATE FOR THE RECALL WAS MARCH 20, 2008. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
